org.crosswire.jsword.book
类 DataPolice

java.lang.Object
  org.crosswire.jsword.book.DataPolice

public final class DataPolice
extends java.lang.Object

When we can't convert some source data then the user doesn't really care and just wants it to work, but it would be good to have some way to get the problems fixed, so as a start point we report them through this class.

作者：
Joe Walker [joe at eireneh dot com]
另请参见：
for license details.
The copyright to this program is held by it's authors.

方法摘要
static void report(java.util.logging.Level lev, java.lang.String message)
          Report a message against the current book and key.

          Report a message against the current book and key.

          Set the current book to enhance error reports

static void setLevel(java.util.logging.Level lev)
          Set the level at which to show problems.

方法详细信息

setBook

public static void setBook(BookMetaData bmd)
Set the current book to enhance error reports

参数：
bmd - the book to report.

setKey

public static void setKey(Key key)
Set the current item to enhance error reports

setReportingLevel

public static void setReportingLevel(java.util.logging.Level lev)
Set the current level at which to report problems. Problems at too fine grain a level might be filtered by default.

参数：
lev - the level to set

setLevel

public static void setLevel(java.util.logging.Level lev)
Set the level at which to show problems.

参数：
lev - the level to set

report

public static void report(java.util.logging.Level lev,
                          java.lang.String message)
Report a message against the current book and key.

参数：
lev - the level at which to report
message - the police report.

report

public static void report(java.lang.String message)
Report a message against the current book and key.

参数：
message - the police report.
